<br><em><strong>This is for internal use only.</em></strong><br>
<br><b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b><br>
1. Basic errors on documents, 3 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 2-3 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 2-3 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items but communication could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, deposit paid and al documents/ invoices correct.<br>


<br><b>Sale & HP Back / Vendor sale</b><br>

1. Basic errors on documents, 5 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 3-4 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 3-4 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, and all documents/ invoices correct and conditions met.<br></contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></field></fields></section></sections></column><column width="50%" uniqueid="sk-2ygo-1534"><sections><section title="Payouts if (value == 'Satisfied')

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ChecklistStatusRender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if ( value == 'In Progress' || value == 'Deferred') 
{ 
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("yellow");
    
}
else if (value == 'Not Applicable')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("red"); 
}
else if (value == 'Completed')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("green");
    
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="approvalrowrender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if ( value == 'Rejected') 
{      
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("red");
    
}
else if (value == 'Approved')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("green"); 
    
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
